message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,500.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This price reflects the product's worth while still offering you a fair deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
